ha.help.slash.description: Ra'ayi mai mu'amala na duk da akwai umarni
ha.help.meta.description: Wannan umarnin yana ba da hanyar haɗin gwiwa don duba duk umarni da ake da su, da taimako ga yadda ake amfani da kowane umarni. Zaɓin menu yana samuwa ga marubucin umarnin kawai, kuma zai nuna ƙarin cikakkun bayanai na umarnin da aka zaɓa. Idan ba a zaɓi umarni ba, za a nuna taƙaitaccen bayani game da duk umarnin da aka samu.
ha.help.hello.description1: **👋 Sannu! : D I'm STW Daily** - Bot ga kowane abu Fortnite: Ajiye Duniya (da ƙari!)
ha.help.hello.description2: Tambayoyi? Matsaloli? A buge mu akan [sabar tallafi!]({0})
ha.help.hello.description3: Gayyace ni zuwa ga uwar garken ku [nan]({0})
ha.help.hello.description4: {0} Don duba umarni na, yi amfani da:
ha.help.hello.epic.fancontentdisclaimer.val: *Yankin kayan da aka yi amfani da su alamun kasuwanci ne da/ko ayyukan haƙƙin mallaka na Wasannin Epic, Inc. Duk haƙƙoƙin Epic ne ke kiyayewa. Wannan kayan ba na hukuma bane kuma Epic bai goyi bayansa ba.

ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description: **Baka saita ingantaccen na'urar akan wannan bayanan ba tukuna**
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.nosess: Sannan kawai kwafi lambar ba da izini, danna maɓallin **{0} Tabbatarwa** Maɓallin da ke ƙasa, sannan liƙa lambar ku a cikin faɗakarwa.
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.active: Kun riga kuna da zaman tantancewa mai aiki! Kuna iya farawa da wannan asusun ta latsa **{0} Auth Tare da Zama**
Idan kuna son canza asusu, zaku iya amfani da [wannan hanyar haɗin yanar gizon]({0}) sannan kawai shigar da lambar izini bayan danna maɓallin **{1} Tabbatarwa**.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.title: Yarjejeniyar mai amfani
ha.devauth.embed.legal.description: **Baku yarda da yarjejeniyar mai amfani akan bayanan martaba ba {0}**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement2: Amfani da waɗannan fasalulluka na STW Daily (Na'ura Auth, Saituna, Profile, da sauransu) ana sarrafa su ta hanyar ƙarin saitin sharuɗɗan masu zuwa:
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement4: Ta hanyar yin amfani da waɗannan fasalulluka, a nan kuna nuna yarjejeniya ga tushen yarjejeniyar STW Daily, akwai a: {0}. Hakanan kun yarda da waɗannan sharuɗɗan da aka zayyana a cikin wannan yarjejeniya.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement6: Samun damar ku zuwa waɗannan fasalulluka yana kasancewa azaman lasisi wanda za'a iya soke shi a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili. Ƙungiyar STW Daily Dev Team tana da haƙƙin soke damar ku a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement8: Kai ne ke da alhakin duk asusu (s) da aka haɗa zuwa wannan sabis ɗin, da duk wani abu da zai iya faruwa gare su. Kai ne ke da alhakin yin aikinka don kiyaye amintattun asusunku, da aminci; KAR KA YI AMFANI DA ACCOUNT (S) WANDA BA KA SAMU HANYAR Imel (sai dai idan ba ka fahimci abin da kake yi ba), a matsayin 'password rest' ana iya kunnawa akan asusu da aka haɗa.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement9: Kuna ɗaukar duk wani alhaki a cikin amfani da STW Daily. Ƙungiyar Daily ta STW ƙila ba za a ɗauki alhakin kowane sakamako mara kyau ba.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement11: Ƙungiyar Daily ta STW tana ƙoƙarin kiyaye asusunku a matsayin amintaccen mai yiwuwa, yayin da yake kasancewa mai gaskiya da buɗe ido. Muna adana wasu ƙayyadaddun bayanai waɗanda ke da alaƙa da asusun Discord ɗin ku akan bayanan MongoDB Atlas wanda aka shirya a Amurka. STW Daily kanta ana gudanar da ita akan sabar AWS a Amurka. Ana adana bayanan asusun ku amintacce azaman rufaffen bayanan AES wanda kawai ɓangare na STW Daily Team ke samun dama ga.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement13: STW Daily za ta tattara da adana taƙaitaccen bayanan da ke da alaƙa da asusun Discord ɗin ku, don adana bayanan ingantattun asusun na dogon lokaci, da kuma samar muku da babban gogewa a yanzu, da kuma nan gaba. Kuna iya duba Manufar Sirrin mu anan: {0}
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description1: Duk lokacin da kuka yi ƙoƙarin tantancewa ba tare da zama mai aiki ba, za ku tantance ta atomatik tare da asusun da ke da alaƙa da wannan bayanin martaba.
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description2: Idan kana son cire wannan hanyar, danna maballin {0} **Cire hanyar haɗi**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description3: Don sake tabbatarwa da wannan asusu, danna maballin {0} **Sake Tabbatarwa Yanzu**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description4.enab: Don kunna da'awar kai ga duk asusunku, danna maɓallin {0} ** Kunna da'awar atomatik ***
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description4.disa: Don kashe da'awar kai ga duk asusunku, danna maɓallin {0} **Kashe Da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.processed.success: *An yi nasarar kunna da'awar ta atomatik*
ha.devauth.slash.name: na'urar
ha.devauth.slash.description: Ƙirƙirar zaman tantancewa wanda zai sa ku shiga na dogon lokaci
ha.devauth.meta.description1: Wannan umarnin yana ba ku damar adana zaman tantancewar ku don kiyaye ku cikin dogon lokaci. Da zarar kun saita wannan umarni, ba za ku ƙara buƙatar samar da lambar auth ɗin ku ba.
ha.devauth.meta.description2: Don Allah kar a yi amfani da wannan umarni sai dai idan kuna da damar shiga imel ɗin asusun ku, saboda ana iya kunna sake saitin kalmar sirri.
ha.devauth.meta.description3: Bayan kun saita ingantaccen na'urar, zaku iya amfani da wannan umarni don shiga cikin lokacin gwaji ta atomatik. Wannan zai ɗauki ladan ku na STW ta atomatik kowace rana. Kuna iya fita daga wannan a kowane lokaci.

ha.settings.config.upcomingdisplaydays.name: Kwanaki masu zuwa don Nunawa
ha.settings.config.upcomingdisplaydays.desc: Yawan kwanakin da za a nuna a cikin saƙonnin lada masu zuwa
Wannan shine adadin kwanakin da za a nuna a cikin sassan lada masu zuwa na yau da kullun. Saita zuwa 0 don kashe nunin lada masu zuwa.

ha.settings.config.nameonauth.name: Nuna Sunan akan Auth
ha.settings.config.nameonauth.description.s: Nuna sunan asusun ku akan tantancewa
ha.settings.config.nameonauth.description.l: Wannan zai nuna sunan asusun ku akan tantancewa idan an kunna. Kashe wannan idan ba ka son a nuna sunan asusunka.
ha.settings.config.lang.name: Harshe
ha.settings.config.lang.description.short: Harshen da za a yi amfani da shi don STW Daily
ha.settings.config.lang.description.long: Wannan shine harshen da za a yi amfani da shi don STW Daily akan wannan bayanin martaba. Auto yana ƙoƙarin ƙayyade harshen ku ta atomatik. Idan kuna son taimakawa fassara STW Daily, da fatan za a shiga sabar tallafi kuma ku tambayi 🥰.
ha.settings.config.lang.modal.label: Shigar da sabon harshe don amfani anan
ha.settings.config.lang.requirement: Dole ne ya zama sunan harshe/ladi mai goyan bayan
ha.settings.config.silent.name: Sanarwa shiru
ha.settings.config.silent.description.short: Kashe sanarwar Discord don STW Daily
ha.settings.config.silent.description.long: Wannan zai murkushe sanarwar Discord daga STW Daily idan an kunna. Ba a tallafawa tare da umarnin yanke hukunci.
ha.settings.config.ephemeral.name: Boye Saƙonni
ha.settings.config.ephemeral.description.sh: Boye saƙonnin STW na yau da kullun daga wasu
ha.settings.config.ephemeral.description.lo: Wannan zai ɓoye saƙonnin STW Daily daga wasu idan an kunna. Ana goyan bayan kawai tare da umarnin slash.

ha.stw.item.HeroXP.name: Jarumi XP
ha.stw.item.HeroXP.desc: An yi amfani da shi don daidaita jarumai da masu tsaron gida. Ana iya samuwa a cikin llamas da ta jarumai ko masu kare baya.
ha.stw.item.Voucher_BasicPack.desc: Nemi lada na kyauta a cikin Loot tab.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_R.name: Jarumi Rare
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Ranged_R.name: Tsare-tsaren Makami Rare
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Melee_R.name: Tsarin Makamai Rare Melee
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T01.desc: Abubuwan da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa.
ha.stw.item.SID_Pistol_FireCracker_R_Ore_T0: Bindiga: Musamman. Yana ƙaddamar da ƙwanƙolin wuta waɗanda ke billa bangon bango, kuma za su yi baya da lalata maƙiya a cikin ƙaramin radius lokacin da suka fashe.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Trap_R.name: Rare Trap Schematic
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Defender_R.name: Rare Defender
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_VR.name: Jarumin Almara
ha.stw.item.Currency_MtxSwap.name: Baucan V-Bucks
ha.stw.item.Currency_MtxSwap.desc: Yana juya zuwa tikitin X-Ray ga kowa da kowa, da kuma V-Bucks idan kuna da asusun Masu Kafa.
ha.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.name: Tikitin X-ray
ha.stw.item.Currency_XRayLlama.desc: Kuɗin da aka samu ta hanyar kammala Buƙatun yau da kullun, Tsaron Garkuwar guguwa, da wasu Faɗakarwar Ofishin Jakadancin. An yi ciniki don X-Ray Llamas a cikin Shagon Llama.
ha.stw.item.Currency_Hybrid_MTX_XRayLlama.d: Yana juya zuwa tikitin X-Ray ga kowa da kowa, da kuma V-Bucks idan kuna da asusun Masu Kafa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Manager_R.name: Rare Gubar tsira
ha.stw.item.SmallXpBoost.desc: Kunna Boost XP don samun maki haɓakar Asusu XP. Ƙarfafa maki sami {0} ƙarin ƙwarewa don kanku, da kuma ba da kyauta {0} ga duk sauran 'yan wasa a ƙungiyar ku! Idan kai mai kafa ne, zaka ba da kyautar 5% ta atomatik ga duk abokan aikin ku. Yawancin 'yan wasan da ke amfani da XP Boosts, mafi girman kari ga kowa!
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_VR.name: Epic Survivor
ha.stw.item.EventCurrency_Scaling.name: Zinariya
ha.stw.item.EventCurrency_Scaling.desc: Kudi na musamman da aka samu ta hanyar kammala ayyuka da buɗe mini llamas. Ana iya siyar da kayayyaki don abubuwa a cikin Shagon Taron.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Bronze.desc: Tsohuwar llama mai aminci, cike take da abubuwa iri-iri da kayan haɓakawa. Ya ƙunshi aƙalla abubuwa 4, gami da wani abu da ba kasafai ba ko jarumi! Yana da babban damar haɓakawa.
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.name: Walƙiya a cikin kwalba
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T02.desc: Abubuwan da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo shi da farko a cikin Plankerton.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_SR.name: Jarumin Almara
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.name: Idon guguwa
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T03.desc: Abubuwan da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo shi da farko a cikin Canny Valley.
ha.stw.item.SmallXpBoost_Gift.desc: Kunna Ƙwararrun Abokin Ƙaƙwalwar Ƙwallon Ƙwallon Ƙwallon Ƙwallon Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙarƙashin Ƙungiya don ba wa abokin aikin Asusun XP maki. Ƙarfafa maki sami {0} ƙarin gogewa ga abokin wasan, haka kuma yana ba ku kyauta {1} da sauran 'yan wasa a ƙungiyar ku! Yawancin 'yan wasan da ke amfani da XP Boosts, mafi girman kari ga kowa!
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Worker_SR.name: Almara mai tsira
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Event_Founders.name: Wanda ya kafa's Llama
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Event_Founders.desc: Fakitin taron na musamman! Yana ba da garantin Babban Makamin Epic wanda ya kafa guda ɗaya tare da madaidaicin matakin 5.
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T04.name: Storm Shard
ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T04.desc: Abubuwan da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar kowane nau'in abubuwa. An samo asali a cikin Twine Peaks.
ha.wex.item.CD_Cleric_VR2_Dark_TerraRifle_T: Yana ba da tallafi na dabara ga ƙungiyar.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_UC1_Painguin_Water_T03.d: Ba tare da tsammani ba ya shiga cikin sojojin abokan gaba kafin ya lalata kansa.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.desc: Yana ƙone ƙananan kusoshi na sihiri.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_VR2_Spry_Light_T04.name: Fesa
ha.wex.item.Gold.desc: Tattara zinari don siyan kaya da ayyuka.
ha.wex.item.Gold.name: Zinariya
ha.wex.item.Hammer.name: Guduma
ha.wex.item.MtxGiveaway.desc: An yi amfani da shi don siyan kaya masu mahimmanci.
ha.wex.item.MtxGiveaway.name: Duwatsu masu daraja
ha.wex.item.Ore_Iron.desc: Abun ciki. Alamar gama gari da ake amfani da ita don haɓaka sulke. Ana iya samuwa a matakin Burny Minne kusa da Ƙunƙarar Ƙunƙara.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Iron.name: Armor Ore
ha.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.desc: Abun ciki. Rare tama da aka yi amfani da su don ƙirƙirar makamai da sulke. Ana iya samuwa a cikin Burny Minne kuma ana samun lokaci-lokaci a cikin Kasuwa.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Magicite.name: sihiri
ha.wex.item.Ore_Silver.desc: Abun ciki. Ma'adanin gama gari da ake amfani da su don haɓaka makamai. Ana iya samuwa a matakin Burny Minne kusa da Ƙunƙarar Ƙunƙara.
ha.wex.item.Ore_Silver.name: Makami Ore
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.desc: Kifi da sauri kusa da wasu lu'ulu'u na fasaha har sai gajeriyar kewayawa. Ana iya amfani da su don ɗaukar jarumai na gama-gari da na yau da kullun.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Bronze.name: Manemin kusanci
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.desc: Hannun Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga jarumta da aka kama. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe tambayoyin Skybreaker don jarumai na farko.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_Elemental.name: Manufofin Jarumi na Core
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.desc: Hannun Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga gwarzon da ya kama. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe tambayoyin Skybreaker don Super Rare Heroes.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.name: Alamomin Jarumi Na Almara
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialArmor.de: Abun ciki. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali a cikin Shagon Asirin.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialShield.d: Abun ciki. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali ta hanyar kammala Dungeons Event.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.de: Abun ciki. An yi amfani da shi don ƙirƙirar jarumai na musamman. An samo asali ta hanyar kammala Kalubale na mako-mako.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.desc: Abun ciki. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.name: Dark Essence
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.desc: Abun ciki. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.name: Asalin Wuta
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.desc: Abun ciki. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.

ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.desc: Abun ciki. Shard mai kima da ake amfani da shi don tallata jarumai. Yawanci ana samun ta hanyar siyar da raka'a, da wuya shuwagabanni ke faɗuwa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Water.name: Asalin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.desc: Abun ciki. An yi amfani da shi don Supercharge jarumai. An samo asali ta hanyar siyar da jaruman Super Rare.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_MysteryGoo.name: Goo mai ban mamaki
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.desc: Abun ciki. Da farko ana amfani dashi don haɓakawa da haɓaka jarumai. An samo shi a cikin digo a ko'ina cikin duniya.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shared_T02.name: Tushen wutar lantarki
ha.wex.item.SkillXP.desc: Kudi. Ana iya amfani da shi don haɓaka matakin iyawa na musamman na kowane jarumi. An samo shi da farko a cikin akwatunan kyauta na aboki.
ha.wex.item.SkillXP.name: Iyawar Musamman XP
ha.wex.item.TM_MapResource.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. An yi amfani da shi don buɗe matakan musamman. Ana samuwa da farko a cikin Gwaji da kuma cikin Kasuwa. Matakan da aka kulle ba su da hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'i na gamawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_MapResource.name: Lockpick
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Hamada mai ban sha'awa. Arziki yana da yawa a cikin wannan ɓangarorin ɓalle! Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.name: An binne a cikin Taswirar Hamada
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar isa ga Planet's Core. An taba tunanin shigarta kogon al'ajabi ce. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.name: Babban Taswirar Duniya'
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterForest.des: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga dajin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa. Wannan dazuzzukan da ke nutsewa na iya ɗaukar asirai da abubuwan ban mamaki da yawa. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterTunnel.des: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Ramin Ƙarƙashin Ruwa. Tatsuniyoyi sun ce an kafa wannan rami ta hanyar mage mai ƙarfi. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga kwarin Waterfall. An san shi duka don kyawun kyawunsa, da waɗanda suka ɓace don neman asirinta. Babu hukunce-hukuncen gazawa, ko juzu'i na kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.name: Taswirar Taswirar Ruwa na Asirin
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.desc: Yana ba da babban, haɓaka na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin HP.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.name: Babban Lafiya Elixir
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.desc: Yana ba da ƙaramin ƙarami, ƙaruwa na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin HP.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMinor.name: Ƙananan Lafiya Elixir
ha.wex.item.UpgradeMana.desc: Yana ba da karuwa na dindindin ga mana.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeMana.name: Mana Elixir
ha.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMajor.desc: Yana ba da ƙaƙƙarfan, haɓaka na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin ATK.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMajor.name: Babban ƙarfi Elixir
ha.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMinor.desc: Yana ba da ƙaramin ƙarami, ƙaruwa na dindindin zuwa ATK.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeStrengthMinor.name: Ƙananan Ƙarfin Elixir
ha.wex.item.Voucher_Chest_Gold.desc: Kirji mai sihiri mai cike da ganima! Bude shi a cikin menu na Kirji.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_Chest_Gold.name: Kirjin sihiri
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroDiamond.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don babban jarumi mara nauyi!
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroDiamond.name: Diamond Hero Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroGold.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don mafi ƙarancin gwarzo ko mafi kyawun gwarzo! Damar samun daga yin amfani da Crystal Hero Crystals ko buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroGold.name: Jarumi Crystal Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Dark.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ko mafi kyawu ba! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Dark.name: Dark Hero Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Fire.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ko mafi kyawu ba! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Fire.name: Jarumin Wuta Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Light.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ko mafi kyawu ba! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Light.name: Hasken Jarumi Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Nature.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ko mafi kyawu ba! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Nature.name: Halitta Jarumi Crystal
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Water.desc: Musanya wannan a cikin kantin sayar da don siyan gwarzon da ba kasafai ko mafi kyawu ba! Damar samu ta buɗe ƙirji a cikin shagon.
ha.wex.item.Voucher_HeroSilver_Water.name: Jarumin Ruwa Crystal
